SELECT Contact { COL MA_Contacts.Contact } ,CompanyName { COL MA_Contacts.CompanyName } ,EMail { COL MA_Contacts.EMail } ,Address { COL MA_Contacts.Address } ,ZIPCode { COL MA_Contacts.ZIPCode } ,City { COL MA_Contacts.City } ,County { COL MA_Contacts.County } ,Country { COL MA_Contacts.Country } ,ContactPerson { COL MA_Contacts.ContactPerson } ,Notes { COL MA_Contacts.Notes } ,Disabled { COL MA_Contacts.Disabled } ,1 as sort FROM MA_Contacts WHERE Contact BETWEEN { IN ask_StartCode } AND { IN ask_EndCode } AND (EMail <> {''} OR EXISTS ( SELECT Email FROM MA_ContactsPeople WHERE MA_ContactsPeople.Contact = MA_Contacts.Contact AND MA_ContactsPeople.Email <> {''} ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT Email FROM MA_ContactBranches WHERE MA_ContactBranches.Contact = MA_Contacts.Contact AND MA_ContactBranches.Email <> {''} ) ) UNION SELECT
Contact {+} '-' {+} Branch AS Contact ,CompanyName ,EMail ,Address ,ZIPCode ,City ,County ,Country ,ContactPerson ,Notes ,Disabled ,3 as sort FROM MA_ContactBranches WHERE MA_ContactBranches.Contact BETWEEN { IN ask_StartCode } AND { IN ask_EndCode } AND (EMail <> {''} OR EXISTS ( SELECT Email FROM MA_ContactsPeople WHERE MA_ContactsPeople.Contact = MA_ContactBranches.Contact AND MA_ContactsPeople.Branch = MA_ContactBranches.Branch AND MA_ContactsPeople.Email <> {''} ) ) UNION SELECT MA_ContactsPeople.Contact {+} '-' {+} MA_ContactsPeople.Branch AS Contact ,'>' {+} MA_ContactsPeople.Name ,MA_ContactsPeople.EMail ,{''} AS Address ,{''} AS ZIPCode ,{''} AS City ,{''} AS County ,{''} AS Country ,WorkingPosition ,MA_ContactsPeople.Notes ,{FALSE} AS Disabled , { WHEN GetDatabaseType ( ) != "ORACLE" EXPAND { CASE MA_ContactsPeople.Branch WHEN '' THEN 2 ELSE 4 END } ELSE { Decode( MA_ContactsPeople.Branch, '', 2, ' ', 2, 4) } } AS sort FROM MA_ContactsPeople LEFT OUTER JOIN MA_ContactBranches ON MA_ContactsPeople.Contact = MA_ContactBranches.Contact AND MA_ContactsPeople.Branch = MA_ContactBranches.Branch WHERE MA_ContactsPeople.Contact BETWEEN { IN ask_StartCode } AND { IN ask_EndCode } AND MA_ContactsPeople.EMail <> {''} ORDER BY 1, sort
